price: 14.Tohuk wadir derre kaat cabeeniih (koros kinnuk), usuk farmoyta hinna seehada barisse cabulikkal kaak iyyen.
arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ مُعَلَّمٞ مَّجۡنُونٌ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma tawallaw ʿanhu waqālū muʿallamun majnūnun
